title: Project Initiation and Planning
description: Define the project scope, timeline, budget, and team structure.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Identify the core functionality, user needs, system requirements, and constraints.

title: Design the LearningAchievementSystem Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the system, including frontend, backend, database, and API architecture.

title: Frontend Development Tasks
description: Develop the user interface for the LearningAchievementSystem, including design, layout, and interaction.

title: Backend Development Tasks
description: Develop the server-side logic and APIs for the LearningAchievementSystem.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Create and implement a database schema for storing user data, learning progress, achievements, and other relevant information.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Integrate secure practices and security features into the LearningAchievementSystem.

title: Perform Code Reviews
description: Review and ensure that all developed code adheres to best practices, style guides, and security standards.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Test the LearningAchievementSystem for functionality, usability, performance, and security issues.

title: Deploy the LearningAchievementSystem
description: Prepare and deploy the LearningAchievementSystem to a production environment.

title: Post-Deployment Monitoring and Maintenance
description: Monitor the LearningAchievementSystem for any issues, fix bugs, and make improvements as necessary.
